user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mark Johnson (mark@helpinghands.org) with the necessary details for the upcoming charity gala. You can check out my NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Key Details on Upcoming Charity Gala

Hi NotionManager Team,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m preparing an email for Mark Johnson at the Helping Hands Foundation that includes all essential information about the upcoming charity gala. Could you please share (or point me to) the most current details in our Notion workspace, including:

• Event date, time, and venue  
• Agenda highlights (e.g., keynote remarks, Mr. Thomas Anderson’s speaking slot)  
• Sponsorship levels and confirmed sponsors  
• Guest list status and VIP contacts  
• Dress code and any special instructions for attendees  
• Important deadlines (ticket sales, final headcount, vendor confirmations)  

If there are any recent updates or documents I should review, please let me know where to find them in Notion—or feel free to grant me direct access.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
